title: DATS descriptive statistics schema
description: an annotation to provide key information about central tendency and variability about a dats.dimension

category.description: A characteristic or property about the entity this object is associated with.

isAbout.description: A material or a dataset, which is the object of this dimension (this dimension is about the material - e.g. the heights of the patients - or the dataset - e.g. the standard deviation or the set of outliers or a quality indicator of a dataset).
